alert.note: Alert for Pope (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:54AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Pope County through 230 AM CDT... At 154 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cyrus, or 12 miles northeast of Morris, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Starbuck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
